00008 #ifndef PS_CHANNEL_H_
00009 #define PS_CHANNEL_H_
00010 
00011 /* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *
00012  * Momentum channel class definition. The momentum channel holds momenta,      *
00013  * invariant masses and the extremal invariant mass bounds for a particular    *
00014  * channel in the recursive phase space decomposition. It also contains a list *
00015  * of particle channels, representing the off-shell invariant mass sampling    *
00016  * channels within.                                                            *
00017  *                                                                             *
00018  * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * */
00019 
00020 #include <list>
00021 #include <limits>
00022 #include <Camorra/bit_string.h>
00023 #include <Camorra/particle.h>
00024 #include <Camorra/flav_comp.h>
00025 #include <Camgen/bipart.h>
00026 #include <Camgen/ps_decl.h>
00027 
00028 namespace Camorra
00029 {
00030     /* Phase space momentum channel class: */
00031 
00032     template<class model_t,std::size_t N_in,std::size_t N_out,class rng_t>class momentum_channel
00033     {
00034         friend class particle_channel<model_t,N_in,N_out,rng_t>;
00035         friend class ps_factory<model_t,N_in,N_out,rng_t,typename model_t::spacetime_type>;
00036         friend class ps_tree<model_t,N_in,N_out,rng_t>;
00037 
00038         public:
00039 
00040             /* Type definitions: */
00041 
00042             typedef model_t model_type;
00043             typedef typename get_spacetime_type<model_t>::type spacetime_type;
00044             typedef typename model_t::value_type value_type;
00045             typedef vector<typename model_t::value_type,model_t::dimension> momentum_type;
00046             typedef std::size_t size_type;
00047             typedef particle_channel<model_t,N_in,N_out,rng_t> particle_channel_type;
00048             typedef std::list<particle_channel_type*> particle_channel_list;
00049             typedef typename particle_channel_list::iterator particle_channel_iterator;
00050             typedef typename particle_channel_list::const_iterator const_particle_channel_iterator;
00051             static const std::size_t N_bits=N_in+N_out-1;
00052             typedef bit_string<N_bits> bit_string_type;
00053 
00054             /* Static members: */
00055             /*-----------------*/
00056 
00057             /* Particle channel comparator: */
00058 
00059             static bool particle_comp(const particle_channel_type* first,const particle_channel_type* second)
00060             {
00061                 if(first->particle_type==NULL)
00062                 {
00063                     if(second->particle_type==NULL)
00064                     {
00065                         return false;
00066                     }
00067                     else
00068                     {
00069                         return true;
00070                     }
00071                 }
00072                 if(second->particle_type==NULL)
00073                 {
00074                     return false;
00075                 }
00076                 flavour_comp< particle<model_t> >comp;
00077                 return comp(first->particle_type,second->particle_type);
00078             }
00079 
00080             /* Particle channel redundancy tester: */
00081 
00082             static bool necessary_particle(const particle_channel_type* p)
00083             {
00084                 return !(p->is_redundant());
00085             }
00086 
00087             /* Public data members */
00088             /*---------------------*/
00089 
00090             /* Channel encoding bit string. */
00091 
00092             const bit_string_type bitstring;
00093 
00094             /* Public constructors */
00095             /*---------------------*/
00096 
00097             /* Momentum-allocating constructor. */
00098 
00099             momentum_channel(bit_string_type bitstring_):bitstring(bitstring_),momentum(new momentum_type),alloc_momentum(true),invariant_mass(0),signed_mass(0),generation_flag(false)
00100             {
00101                 if(timelike())
00102                 {
00103                     sminmin=(value_type)0;
00104                     mminmin=(value_type)0;
00105                     smaxmax=std::numeric_limits<value_type>::infinity();
00106                     mmaxmax=std::numeric_limits<value_type>::infinity();
00107                 }
00108                 if(spacelike())
00109                 {
00110                     sminmin=-std::numeric_limits<value_type>::infinity();
00111                     mminmin=-std::numeric_limits<value_type>::infinity();
00112                     smaxmax=(value_type)0;
00113                     mmaxmax=(value_type)0;
00114                 }
00115                 momentum->assign((value_type)0);
00116             }
00117 
00118             /* Momentum reference-copying constructor. */
00119 
00120             momentum_channel(bit_string_type bitstring_,momentum_type* momentum_):bitstring(bitstring_),momentum(momentum_),alloc_momentum(false),invariant_mass(0),signed_mass(0),generation_flag(false)
00121             {
00122                 if(timelike())
00123                 {
00124                     sminmin=(value_type)0;
00125                     mminmin=(value_type)0;
00126                     smaxmax=std::numeric_limits<value_type>::infinity();
00127                     mmaxmax=std::numeric_limits<value_type>::infinity();
00128                 }
00129                 if(spacelike())
00130                 {
00131                     sminmin=-std::numeric_limits<value_type>::infinity();
00132                     mminmin=-std::numeric_limits<value_type>::infinity();
00133                     smaxmax=(value_type)0;
00134                     mmaxmax=(value_type)0;
00135                 }
00136                 momentum->assign((value_type)0);
00137             }
00138 
00139             /* Destructor */
00140             /*------------*/
00141 
00142             virtual ~momentum_channel()
00143             {
00144                 if(alloc_momentum)
00145                 {
00146                     delete momentum;
00147                 }
00148                 for(particle_channel_iterator it=particle_channels.begin();it!=particle_channels.end();++it)
00149                 {
00150                     delete *it;
00151                 }
00152             }
00153 
00154             /* Public modifyers */
00155             /*------------------*/
00156 
00157             /* Evaluates all subchannel weights: */
00158 
00159             bool evaluate_weight()
00160             {
00161                 bool q=true;
00162                 for(particle_channel_iterator it=particle_channels.begin();it!=particle_channels.end();++it)
00163                 {
00164                     q&=(*it)->evaluate_weight();
00165                 }
00166                 return q;
00167             }
00168 
00169             /* Adds a particle channel: */
00170 
00171             particle_channel_type* add_particle_channel(const particle<model_t>* phi,const value_type* Ecmhat=NULL)
00172             {
00173                 /* If the channel is external, replace the particle channels: */
00174                 
00175                 if(on_shell())
00176                 {
00177                     if(any())
00178                     {
00179                         for(particle_channel_iterator it=particle_channels.begin();it!=particle_channels.end();++it)
00180                         {
00181                             delete *it;
00182                         }
00183                         particle_channels.clear();
00184                     }
00185                     particle_channel_type* p=new particle_channel_type(this,phi,Ecmhat);
00186                     particle_channel_iterator it=std::lower_bound(particle_channels.begin(),particle_channels.end(),p,particle_comp);
00187                     particle_channels.insert(it,p);
00188                     return p;
00189                 }
00190 
00191                 /* If the particle channel is already constructed, return the
00192                  * instance: */
00193 
00194                 for(particle_channel_iterator it=particle_channels.begin();it!=particle_channels.end();++it)
00195                 {
00196                     if((*it)->particle_type==phi)
00197                     {
00198                         return *it;
00199                     }
00200                 }
00201 
00202                 /* If the particle is pure gauge, do nothing and return the null
00203                  * pointer: */
00204 
00205                 if(phi!=NULL)
00206                 {
00207                     if(phi->get_pdg_id()==0 and !phi->is_auxiliary())
00208                     {
00209                         return NULL;
00210                     }
00211                 }
00212                 particle_channel_type* p=new particle_channel_type(this,phi,Ecmhat);
00213                 particle_channel_iterator it=std::lower_bound(particle_channels.begin(),particle_channels.end(),p,particle_comp);
00214                 particle_channels.insert(it,p);
00215                 return p;
00216             }
00217 
00218             /* Returns the particle channel of flavour phi. Returns the null
00219              * pointer if not found: */
00220 
00221             particle_channel_type* find_particle_channel(const particle<model_t>* phi)
00222             {
00223                 for(particle_channel_iterator it=particle_channels.begin();it!=particle_channels.end();++it)
00224                 {
00225                     if((*it)->particle_type==phi)
00226                     {
00227                         return *it;
00228                     }
00229                 }
00230                 return NULL;
00231             }
00232 
00233             /* Returns the particle channel of particle name phi. Returns the null
00234              * pointer if not found: */
00235 
00236             particle_channel_type* find_particle_channel(const std::string& phi)
00237             {
00238                 for(particle_channel_iterator it=particle_channels.begin();it!=particle_channels.end();++it)
00239                 {
00240                     if((*it)->particle_type->get_name()==phi)
00241                     {
00242                         return *it;
00243                     }
00244                 }
00245                 return NULL;
00246             }
00247 
00248             /* Evaluates the invariant mass from the momentum. */
00249 
00250             value_type evaluate_s()
00251             {
00252                 invariant_mass=spacetime_type::dot(*momentum,*momentum);
00253                 signed_mass=(invariant_mass<0)?(-std::sqrt(-invariant_mass)):std::sqrt(invariant_mass);
00254                 return invariant_mass;
00255             }
00256 
00257             /* Evaluates the invariant mass from the invariant mass-squared. */
00258 
00259             value_type evaluate_m()
00260             {
00261                 signed_mass=(invariant_mass<0)?(-std::sqrt(-invariant_mass)):std::sqrt(invariant_mass);
00262                 return signed_mass;
00263             }
00264 
00265             /* Resets the generation flags. */
00266 
00267             void reset_generation_flags()
00268             {
00269                 for(particle_channel_iterator it=particle_channels.begin();it!=particle_channels.end();++it)
00270                 {
00271                     (*it)->reset_generation_flags();
00272                 }
00273             }
00274 
00275             /* Sets the momentum pointer: */
00276 
00277             void set_momentum(momentum_type* p_)
00278             {
00279                 if(alloc_momentum)
00280                 {
00281                     delete momentum;
00282                 }
00283                 momentum=p_;
00284                 alloc_momentum=false;
00285             }
00286 
00287             /* Sets the minimal minimal invariant mass-squared and updates all particle
00288              * channels: */
00289             
00290             bool set_s_min_min(const value_type& sminmin_)
00291             {
00292                 sminmin=sminmin_;
00293                 mminmin=sgn_sqrt(sminmin);
00294                 bool q=true;
00295                 for(particle_channel_iterator it=particle_channels.begin();it!=particle_channels.end();++it)
00296                 {
00297                     q&=((*it)->set_s_min_min(sminmin));
00298                 }
00299                 return q;
00300             }
00301 
00302             /* Sets the minimal minimal signed invariant mass. Updates all propagator
00303             samplers invariant mass limits. */
00304             
00305             bool set_m_min_min(const value_type& mminmin_)
00306             {
00307                 mminmin=mminmin_;
00308                 sminmin=sgn_sq(mminmin);
00309                 bool q=true;
00310                 for(particle_channel_iterator it=particle_channels.begin();it!=particle_channels.end();++it)
00311                 {
00312                     q&=((*it)->set_s_min_min(sminmin));
00313                 }
00314                 return q;
00315             }
00316 
00317             /* Sets the minimal invariant mass-squared for all particle
00318              * channels: */
00319             
00320             bool set_s_min(const value_type& smin_)
00321             {
00322                 bool q=true;
00323                 for(particle_channel_iterator it=particle_channels.begin();it!=particle_channels.end();++it)
00324                 {
00325                     q&=((*it)->set_s_min(smin_));
00326                 }
00327                 return q;
00328             }
00329 
00330             /* Sets the minimal invariant mass for all particle channels: */
00331             
00332             bool set_m_min(const value_type& mmin_)
00333             {
00334                 bool q=true;
00335                 for(particle_channel_iterator it=particle_channels.begin();it!=particle_channels.end();++it)
00336                 {
00337                     q&=((*it)->set_m_min(mmin_));
00338                 }
00339                 return q;
00340             }
00341 
00342             /* Sets the maximal invariant mass-squared for all channels: */
00343             
00344             bool set_s_max_max(const value_type& smaxmax_)
00345             {
00346                 smaxmax=smaxmax_;
00347                 mmaxmax=sgn_sqrt(smaxmax);
00348                 bool q=true;
00349                 for(particle_channel_iterator it=particle_channels.begin();it!=particle_channels.end();++it)
00350                 {
00351                     q&=((*it)->set_s_max_max(smaxmax));
00352                 }
00353                 return q;
00354             }
00355 
00356             /* Sets the minimal signed invariant mass. Updates all propagator
00357             samplers invariant mass limits. */
00358             
00359             bool set_m_max_max(const value_type& mmaxmax_)
00360             {
00361                 mmaxmax=mmaxmax_;
00362                 smaxmax=sgn_sq(mmaxmax);
00363                 bool q=true;
00364                 for(particle_channel_iterator it=particle_channels.begin();it!=particle_channels.end();++it)
00365                 {
00366                     q&=((*it)->set_s_max_max(smaxmax));
00367                 }
00368                 return q;
00369             }
00370 
00371             /* Sets the maximal invariant mass-squared for all particle
00372              * channels: */
00373             
00374             bool set_s_max(const value_type& smax_)
00375             {
00376                 bool q=true;
00377                 for(particle_channel_iterator it=particle_channels.begin();it!=particle_channels.end();++it)
00378                 {
00379                     q&=((*it)->set_s_max(smax_));
00380                 }
00381                 return q;
00382             }
00383 
00384             /* Sets the maximal invariant mass for all particle channels: */
00385             
00386             bool set_m_max(const value_type& mmax_)
00387             {
00388                 bool q=true;
00389                 for(particle_channel_iterator it=particle_channels.begin();it!=particle_channels.end();++it)
00390                 {
00391                     q&=((*it)->set_m_max(mmax_));
00392                 }
00393                 return q;
00394             }
00395 
00396             /* Function filling the mmin components for timelike channels: */
00397 
00398             void assign_mmin_components(value_type mminout[N_out][N_out])
00399             {
00400                 mmin_decomps.clear();
00401                 mmin_decomps_bar.clear();
00402                 std::set<size_type>s,sbar;
00403                 for(size_type i=0;i<N_out;++i)
00404                 {
00405                     if(bitstring[N_in-1+i])
00406                     {
00407                         s.insert(i);
00408                     }
00409                     else
00410                     {
00411                         sbar.insert(i);
00412                     }
00413                 }
00414                 bi_partition part(s);
00415                 std::vector<const value_type*>row;
00416                 for(size_type i=0;i<part.size();++i)
00417                 {
00418                     row.clear();
00419                     for(size_type j=0;j<part[i].size();++j)
00420                     {
00421                         row.push_back(&mminout[part[i][j].first][part[i][j].second]);
00422                     }
00423                     mmin_decomps.push_back(row);
00424                 }
00425                 bi_partition partbar(sbar);
00426                 for(size_type i=0;i<partbar.size();++i)
00427                 {
00428                     row.clear();
00429                     for(size_type j=0;j<partbar[i].size();++j)
00430                     {
00431                         row.push_back(&mminout[partbar[i][j].first][partbar[i][j].second]);
00432                     }
00433                     mmin_decomps_bar.push_back(row);
00434                 }
00435             }
00436 
00437             /* Re-evaluates mminmin from branchings. */
00438 
00439             bool refresh_m_min(const value_type& s,const value_type& sa,const value_type& sb)
00440             {
00441                 if(on_shell())
00442                 {
00443                     return true;
00444                 }
00445                 if(timelike())
00446                 {
00447                     value_type result(0);
00448                     for(size_type i=0;i<mmin_decomps.size();++i)
00449                     {
00450                         value_type s(0);
00451                         for(size_type j=0;j<mmin_decomps[i].size();++j)
00452                         {
00453                             s+=(*mmin_decomps[i][j]);
00454                         }
00455                         result=std::max(result,s);
00456                     }
00457                     return set_m_min_min(result);
00458                 }
00459                 else if(spacelike())
00460                 {
00461                     value_type s1(0);
00462                     for(size_type i=0;i<mmin_decomps.size();++i)
00463                     {
00464                         value_type s(0);
00465                         for(size_type j=0;j<mmin_decomps[i].size();++j)
00466                         {
00467                             s+=(*mmin_decomps[i][j]);
00468                         }
00469                         s1=std::max(s1,s);
00470                     }
00471                     value_type s2(0);
00472                     for(size_type i=0;i<mmin_decomps_bar.size();++i)
00473                     {
00474                         value_type s(0);
00475                         for(size_type j=0;j<mmin_decomps_bar[i].size();++j)
00476                         {
00477                             s+=(*mmin_decomps_bar[i][j]);
00478                         }
00479                         s2=std::max(s2,s);
00480                     }
00481                     value_type lambda=std::sqrt(Kallen(s,sa,sb)*Kallen(s,s1,s2));
00482 
00483                     value_type t1min=sb+s1-0.5*((s+sb-sa)*(s+s1-s2)+lambda)/s;
00484                     value_type t1max=sb+s1-0.5*((s+sb-sa)*(s+s1-s2)-lambda)/s;
00485 
00486                     value_type t2min=sa+s2-0.5*((s+sa-sb)*(s+s2-s1)+lambda)/s;
00487                     value_type t2max=sa+s2-0.5*((s+sa-sb)*(s+s2-s1)-lambda)/s;
00488 
00489                     bool q1,q2;
00490                     if(t1max<t2max)
00491                     {
00492                         q1=set_s_min_min(t1min);
00493                         q2=set_s_max_max(t1max);
00494                     }
00495                     else
00496                     {
00497                         q1=set_s_min_min(t2min);
00498                         q2=set_s_max_max(t2max);
00499                     }
00500                     return (q1 and q2);
00501 
00502                     return true;
00503                 }
00504                 return false;
00505             }
00506 
00507             /* Refreshes internal generation parameters. */
00508 
00509             bool refresh_params()
00510             {
00511                 bool q=true;
00512                 for(particle_channel_iterator it=particle_channels.begin();it!=particle_channels.end();++it)
00513                 {
00514                     q&=((*it)->refresh_params());
00515                 }
00516                 return q;
00517             }
00518 
00519             /* Updates all subchannels with the argument value: */
00520 
00521             void update(const value_type& integrand)
00522             {
00523                 for(particle_channel_iterator it=particle_channels.begin();it!=particle_channels.end();++it)
00524                 {
00525                     (*it)->integrand()=integrand;
00526                     (*it)->update();
00527                 }
00528             }
00529

00531 
00532             void adapt_grids()
00533             {
00534                 for(particle_channel_iterator it=particle_channels.begin();it!=particle_channels.end();++it)
00535                 {
00536                     (*it)->adapt_grids();
00537                 }
00538             }
00539

00544                 for(particle_channel_iterator it=particle_channels.begin();it!=particle_channels.end();++it)
00545                 {
00546                     (*it)->adapt_channels();
00547                 }
00548             }
00549 
00550             /* Adapts all subchannels: */
00551 
00552             void adapt()
00553             {
00554                 for(particle_channel_iterator it=particle_channels.begin();it!=particle_channels.end();++it)
00555                 {
00556                     (*it)->adapt();
00557                 }
00558             }
00559 
00560             /* Resets all subchannel multichannel configurations:
00561              * */
00562 
00563             void reset()
00564             {
00565                 for(particle_channel_iterator it=particle_channels.begin();it!=particle_channels.end();++it)
00566                 {
00567                     (*it)->reset();
00568                 }
00569             }
00570 
00571             /* Sets all particle channel redundancy flags: */
00572             
00573             void set_redundant()
00574             {
00575                 for(particle_channel_iterator it=particle_channels.begin();it!=particle_channels.end();++it)
00576                 {
00577                     (*it)->set_redundant();
00578                 }
00579             }
00580 
00581             /* Cleans the channel from all redundant subchannels: */
00582 
00583             void clean()
00584             {
00585                 particle_channel_iterator it=std::stable_partition(particle_channels.begin(),particle_channels.end(),necessary_particle);
00586                 for(particle_channel_iterator it2=particle_channels.begin();it2!=it;++it2)
00587                 {
00588                     (*it2)->clean();
00589                 }
00590                 for(particle_channel_iterator it2=it;it2!=particle_channels.end();++it2)
00591                 {
00592                     delete *it2;
00593                 }
00594                 particle_channels.erase(it,particle_channels.end());
00595             }
00596 
00597             /* Sets the multichannel adaptivity and threshold to the argument
00598              * pair: */
00599 
00600             void set_multichannel_params(const std::pair<value_type,value_type>& x)
00601             {
00602                 for(particle_channel_iterator it=particle_channels.begin();it!=particle_channels.end();++it)
00603                 {
00604                     (*it)->set_multichannel_params(x);
00605                 }
00606             }

00693             
00694             /* Returns whether there are no particles propagating: */
00695 
00696             bool empty() const
00697             {
00698                 return (particle_channels.size()==0);
00699             }
00700 
00701             /* Returns whther there are particles propagating: */
00702 
00703             bool any() const
00704             {
00705                 return (particle_channels.size()!=0);
00706             }
00707 
00708             /* Returns whether the momentum channel is redundant: */
00709 
00710             bool is_redundant() const
00711             {
00712                 for(const_particle_channel_iterator it=particle_channels.begin();it!=particle_channels.end();++it)
00713                 {
00714                     if(!((*it)->is_redundant()))
00715                     {
00716                         return false;
00717                     }
00718                 }
00719                 return true;
00720             }
00721 
00722             /* Returns whether the channel is external. */
00723 
00724             bool on_shell() const
00725             {
00726                 size_type c=bitstring.count();
00727                 return (c==0 or c==1 or c==(N_in+N_out-1));
00728             }
00729 
00730             /* Returns whether the channel is internal. */
00731 
00732             bool off_shell() const
00733             {
00734                 return !on_shell();
00735             }
00736 
00737             /* Returns whether we have a t-type channel.*/
00738 
00739             bool spacelike() const
00740             {
00741                 return (N_in==1)?false:(bitstring.count()<N_bits and bitstring.count()!=1 and bitstring[0]);
00742             }
00743 
00744             /* Returns whether we have an s-type channel. */
00745 
00746             bool timelike() const
00747             {
00748                 return !spacelike();
00749             }
00750 
00751             /* Returns whether the channel has just been generated: */
00752 
00753             bool is_generated() const
00754             {
00755                 return generation_flag;
00756             }
00757 
00758             /* Normalisation checking utility: */
00759 
00760             std::ostream& check_s_norm(std::ostream& os) const
00761             {
00762                 if(on_shell())
00763                 {
00764                     return os;
00765                 }
00766                 for(const_particle_channel_iterator it=particle_channels.begin();it!=particle_channels.end();++it)
00767                 {
00768                     (*it)->check_s_norm(os);
00769                 }
00770                 return os;
00771             }
00772 
00773             /* Serialization */
00774             /*---------------*/
00775 
00776             /* Printing method. */
00777             
00778             std::ostream& print(std::ostream& os) const
00779             {
00780                 std::stringstream sstr1,sstr2;
00781                 sstr1<<bitstring;
00782                 int n=N_in+N_out+10;
00783                 os<<std::endl<<std::setw(N_in+N_out+10)<<std::left<<sstr1.str();
00784                 n+=6*model_t::dimension+15;
00785                 sstr2<<*momentum;
00786                 os<<std::setw(6*model_t::dimension+20)<<std::left<<sstr2.str();
00787                 os<<std::setw(23)<<std::left<<signed_mass;
00788                 os<<std::setw(23)<<std::left<<mminmin;
00789                 os<<std::setw(23)<<std::left<<mmaxmax<<std::endl;
00790                 os<<std::setw(n+70)<<std::setfill('.')<<'.'<<std::endl;
00791                 os<<std::setfill(' ');
00792                 os<<std::endl;
00793                 for(const_particle_channel_iterator it=particle_channels.begin();it!=particle_channels.end();++it)
00794                 {
00795                     (*it)->print(os);
00796                     os<<std::endl;
00797                 }
00798                 os<<std::setw(n+70)<<std::setfill('-')<<'-'<<std::endl;
00799                 os<<std::setfill(' ');
00800                 return os;
00801             }
00802 
00803             /* Other printing method: */
00804 
00805             std::ostream& shortprint(std::ostream& os) const
00806             {
00807                 os<<bitstring<<"\t, p = "<<*momentum<<", m = "<<signed_mass<<", [m--,m++] = ["<<mminmin<<','<<mmaxmax<<']';
00808                 return os;
00809             }
00810 
00811             /* Overridden loading function: */
00812 
00813             std::istream& load(std::istream& is)
00814             {
00815                 safe_read(is,signed_mass);
00816                 safe_read(is,mminmin);
00817                 safe_read(is,mmaxmax);
00818                 
00819                 invariant_mass=sgn_sq(signed_mass);
00820                 sminmin=sgn_sq(mminmin);
00821                 smaxmax=sgn_sq(mmaxmax);
00822                 std::string initflag;
00823                 std::getline(is,initflag);
00824                 return is;
00825             }
00826 
00827             /* Overridden saving function: */
00828 
00829             std::ostream& save(std::ostream& os) const
00830             {
00831                 os<<"<channel>"<<std::endl;
00832                 os<<bitstring<<std::endl;
00833                 safe_write(os,signed_mass);
00834                 os<<"\t";
00835                 safe_write(os,mminmin);
00836                 os<<"\t";
00837                 safe_write(os,mmaxmax);
00838                 os<<std::endl;
00839                 for(typename particle_channel_list::const_iterator it=particle_channels.begin();it!=particle_channels.end();++it)
00840                 {
00841                     (*it)->save(os);
00842                 }
00843                 os<<"</channel>"<<std::endl;
00844                 return os;
00845             }
00846 
00847         private:
00848 
00849             /* Private data members: */
00850             /*-----------------------*/
00851 
00852             /* Particles propagating in the momentum channel: */
00853 
00854             particle_channel_list particle_channels;
00855 
00856             /* Momentum: */
00857 
00858             momentum_type* momentum;
00859 
00860             /* Momentum allocator flag: */
00861 
00862             bool alloc_momentum;
00863 
00864             /* Invariant mass-squared: */
00865 
00866             value_type invariant_mass;
00867             
00868             /* Signed invariant mass: */
00869             
00870             value_type signed_mass;
00871 
00872             /* Extremal invariant mass bounds: */
00873 
00874             value_type sminmin,mminmin,smaxmax,mmaxmax;
00875 
00876             /* Vector of references for computing smin: */
00877 
00878             std::vector<std::vector<const value_type*> > mmin_decomps;
00879 
00880             /* Vector of references for computing the adjoint smin: */
00881 
00882             std::vector<std::vector<const value_type*> > mmin_decomps_bar;
00883 
00884             /* Generation flag: */
00885 
00886             bool generation_flag;
00887     };
00888     template<class model_t,std::size_t N_in,std::size_t N_out,class rng_t>const std::size_t momentum_channel<model_t,N_in,N_out,rng_t>::N_bits;
00889 
00890     /* Output stream overload: */
00891 
00892     template<class model_t,std::size_t N_in,std::size_t N_out,class rng_t>std::ostream& operator << (std::ostream& os,const momentum_channel<model_t,N_in,N_out,rng_t>& c)
00893     {
00894         return c.shortprint(os);
00895     }
00896 
00897     /* Phase space momentum channel comparison class, ordering according to the
00898      * Caravaglios-Moretti algorithm, */
00899 
00900     template<class model_t,std::size_t N_in,std::size_t N_out,class rng_t>class momentum_channel_comp
00901     {
00902         public:
00903 
00904             typedef momentum_channel<model_t,N_in,N_out,rng_t> value_type;
00905 
00906             bool operator ()(const value_type& a,const value_type& b) const
00907             {
00908                 return a.bitstring<b.bitstring;
00909             }
00910             bool operator ()(const value_type* a,const value_type* b) const
00911             {
00912                 return a->bitstring<b->bitstring;
00913             }
00914     };
00915 }
